comment: Things published in other people's publications. Might not change, but might be added to.

publications.name: From Git To Github - An Introduction to Version-Controlled and Collaborative Development
publications.summary: This talk and live tutorial provided attendees a crash course in enough Git and Github to get them up and running in open source contribution.

publications.name: Effective Communication While Freelancing
publications.summary: In this article, I discuss establishing and maintaining an effective line of communication with clients.

publications.name: A Docker-Compose PHP Environment From Scratch
publications.summary: In this tutorial, I go through the process of setting up a Docker cluster-based environment for PHP development using Docker-Compose. The cluster includes nodes for Nginx, php-fpm, and MariaDB.
